notes: Held annually in March, featuring action/activism-inspiring films.

name: Maryland Film Festival
notes: Held annually for 4 days each May.

name: Method Fest Independent Film Festival
notes: The Method Fest is the Actor's Film Festival, a festival of discovery, seeking breakout-acting performances of emerging stars and established actors in story-driven independent films.

name: Mexico City International Contemporary Film Festival
notes: Also known as FICCO, it is hosted by Cinemex.

name: Miami International Film Festival

name: Miami Short Film Festival
notes: Held annually for 10 days in mid November.

name: Midwest Ski Film Festival

name: Milwaukee Film Festival
notes: Takes place each September and October.

name: Minneapolis St. Paul International Film Festival

name: Mods & Rockers Film Festival

name: Montclair Film Festival

name: Montreal World Film Festival

name: Monument Valley Film Festival

name: New Orleans Film Festival

name: Newport Beach Film Festival

name: New York Film Festival

name: New York Polish Film Festival

name: Northeast Film Festival

name: San Antonio Film Festival

name: Santa Fe Film Festival
